query:
SELECT 
  state,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as verified_count
FROM installers
GROUP BY state
ORDER BY count DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 22sCsLKPiGMTHLp.2c93ddc59017 --database VWkZBmWbz2ke2ZvPeuVdTw --execute SELECT 
  state,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as verified_count
FROM installers
GROUP BY state
ORDER BY count DESC
